testcase.name: Test case to validate whether decision created with priority
testcase.system-out: Given user launches Url of fingertip........................................passed And user enters username and password.......................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user validate fingertip text in home page..............................passed And Click on Decision Tab...................................................passed And Click on New button.....................................................passed And user enters "xx_testdecision_check_2_jyothi" in NewDecision page........passed And user enters "Test description xx2" in decision page.....................passed And user selects "Very Low" as priority.....................................passed And I click on backup for accoutable link...................................passed Then Enter "Sunil George" in backup for accoutable link.....................passed And user validate "Sunil George" in responsible field.......................passed And I click on Consulted button.............................................passed Then Enter "Sunil George" in Consulted link.................................passed And I click on Informed button..............................................passed Then Enter "Sunil George" in Informed link..................................passed Then CLick on Share button..................................................passed And I vaidate text "xx_testdecision_check_2_jyothi" in Decision page........passed
